description: This aspect represents the information included in a global transport label of a transport unit. A transport unit is one or more oder items of a delivery united to one unit that is not altered during the whole transport.

SupplierIdCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to give information on the ID of the supplier.

ThoroughfareTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a thoroughfare.

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

ThoroughfareEntity.description: Entity for a thoroughfare which consists of a type, value and number.

technicalKey.description: Technical key of a thoroughfare. As specified by BPDM, this can be a "STREET" or a different type.

value.description: Value of a thoroughfare, e.g. name of a street.

number.description: Number of a thoroughfare. As used differently in international context, this number can contain both numerical and alphanumerical values.

ThoroughfareCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a thoroughfare which can consist of a type (e.g. "STREET"), value (e.g. "Bernstra?e") and number (e.g. "45"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

LocalityTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a locality

LocalityEntity.description: Entity for a locality which consists of a key and a value.

value.description: Value of a locality, e.g. name of a city ("Mannheim").

LocalityCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a locality which belongs to an address and which consists of a type (e.g. "CITY") and value (e.g. "Mannheim"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

PremiseTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a premise.

PremiseEntity.description: Entity for a premise which consists of a type (technical key) and a value.

value.description: Value of a premise, e.g. name or designation of a particular site.

PremiseCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a premise which consists of a technical key (e.g. "BUILDING" or "OTHER") and a value (e.g. "Werk 1").

PostalDeliveryPointTechnicalKeyCharacter.description: Characteristic of the technical key of a postal delivery point.

PostalDeliveryPointEntity.description: Entity for a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key and a value.

technicalKey.description: Technical key of a postal delivery point.

value.description: Value of a postal delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate.

PostalDeliveryPointCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a postal delivery point which consists of a technical key (e.g. "MAILBOX" or "OTHER") and a value. Model follows the specification of BPDM.

CountryTrait.description: Regular expression for designation of a short name of a country as defined in ISO 3166-2.

shortName.description: The short variation of the name of the country.

CountryCharacteristic.description: Characteristic of a country belonging to an address

PostCodeTechnicalKeyCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for the technical key of a post code.

PostCodeEntity.description: Entity for a postcode which consists of a type plus a value.

value.description: The value of a post code.

technicalKey.description: The technical key of a post code.

PostCodeCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for defining a postcode which can consist of a type (e.g. "REGULAR" for zip codes) and a value (e.g. "98765-4321"). Model follows the specification of BPDM.

PostalAddress.description: A characteristic to express the postal address and which is intended to be referenced by other aspects.

premise.description: Premise of an address, e.g. a specific "BUILDING" but can also be used for naming a particular site.

postalDeliveryPoint.description: Delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate.

BpnsTrait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNS is composed of prefix 'BPNS', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

ShipFromCharacteristic.description: Information about the sender of the transport unit

supplierId.description: The supplier ID is filled in if the actual sender of the goods differs from the actual supplier. In other words, the supplier ID provides information on where the goods are actually delivered from - the physical sender of the goods. A supplier ID is assigned by the ordering company for this purpose. This is not created or hosted centrally, similar to the DUNS number. It is freely selectable and can therefore be freely designed in terms of syntax.ID number from the supplier.

address.description: The address of the data provider.

UnloadingPointCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describe the unloading point.

InternalDestinationCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describe the internal destination.

BpnaTrait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNA is composed of prefix 'BPNA', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

ShipToCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for the information about the recipient of the transport unit.

unloadingPoint.description: Unloading point where the means of transport is being unloaded.

internalDestination.description: Additional Internal destination at recipients' side after unloading (warehouse / storage).

address.description: The address of the data provider.

LabelTypeCharacteristic.description:
Describes the label type according to VDA 4994.
6J = Master (M)
5J = Mixed (MIX)
1J = Single (S)

DeliveryNoteNumberCharaceristic.description: Characteristic to describe the delivery note number, issued by sender.

SupplierNumberCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describe the supplier number of the sender assigned by customer.

deliveryNoteNumber.description: Associated delivery note number, assigned by sender.

supplierNumber.description: Supplier number assigned to the seller by the customer. This supplier number may differ from ship-from's identifier, depending on the numbering concept applied by the customer.

CustomerSpecificRoutingCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describe the customer specific routing information.

ExpectedTimeOfArrivalCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describe the time of arrival.

NetWeight.description: Net weight of the loading unit or inner packaging item in kilogram.

GrossWeight.description: Gross weight of the loading unit or inner packaging item in kilogram.

QuantityValueCharacteristic.description: The quantity value associated with the unit expressed as float.

ItemQuantityCharacteristic.description: Characteristic for measurements of an item (mass, count, linear, area, volume, misc).

value.description: The quantity value associated with the unit.

unit.description: The unit of an item. Common units may be related to mass, count, linear, area, volume or misc.

expectedTimeOfArrival.description: Expected/request delivery time of the goods at the customer's premises.

netWeight.description: Net weight of the loading unit or inner packaging item.

grossWeight.description: Gross weight of the loading unit or inner packaging item.

itemQuantityProperty.description: This property defines common units and the value for items. Items may be measured as mass, countable, miscellaneous, linear, area or volume.

CustomerPartNumberCharacteristic.description: Describes the number of the part provided by the customer.

CustomerPartDescriptionCharacteristic.description: Name of the part as assigned by the customer.

SafetyRelevantPartCharacteristic.description: Describes, wether the part is safety-relevant or not. If true, the part is safety-relevant. If false, the part is not safety-relevant.

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

ContentDescriptionCharacteristic.description: Number that the customer uses to identify the delivered part.

customerPartNumber.description: Number that the customer uses to identify the delivered part.

customerPartDescription.description: Name of the part as assigned by the customer.

safetyRelevantPart.description: Describes, wether the part is safety-relevant or not.

catenaXId.description: Catena-X ID of partType / delivered goods.

LicensePlateTrait.description: Regular Expression to ensure the correct format of the Licence Plate

DataIdentifierCharacteristic.description:
Characteristic that describes the data identifier. Possible values are:
J - Unique package ID of a bundle in the empty packages process
1J - Unique package ID of inner packaging (Single Label)
3J - Unique package ID of JIS loading unit with compartments
4J - Unique package ID of JIS loading unit with 1...n JIS packages
5J - Unique package ID of mixed loading unit with intermediate packaging level (mixed master)
6J - Unique package ID of loading unit or intermediate packaging containing identical parts (Mas-ter Label for homogeneous loading unit)

PackageIdCharacteristic.description: Characteristic to describes the Package ID.

licencePlate.description:
Globally unique package ID of the package /
loading unit: it does not include the data identifier. It includes the issuing agency code (IAC), the company identification number (CIN), and the serial number (SN).

dataIdentifier.description:
The data identifier (DI) is a classifying characteristic and precedes the actual barcode content. The data identifier classifies the packages into Single, Homogeneous Master, Mixed Master.
Identifiers are based on ISO 17367

PackagingTypeCodeCharacteristic.description: Characteristic that describes the packaging type code.

DateCategoryEnumeration.description: Enumeration describing the date category conventions.

DateTrait.description: Regular Expression for the given date conditions.

DateCategoryEntity.description: Encapsulates the information of the Date Category Entity.

dateCategory.description:
Expery (E)
Shipment (S)
Production (P) 
in that order of priority

date.description: Dates are to be given in the following format according to the example in the VDA recommendation: CCYY-MM-DD. Where the indication of times is required, they are to be separated from the date by a slash "/" and printed in a 24-hour format HH:MM

DateCategorySet.description: A data set to define the data property for a date.

StringCharacteristic.description: Characteristic describing a non defined string.

CustomerReference2Characteristic.description: Characteristic that describes the customer reference 2 information,

packagingTypeCode.description: Is a digit code identifying the packaging type code.

dateCategoryInformation.description:
On Master and Mixed Labels attached to loading units: Package type, ship-ping date, number of inner packages
The following applies to inner packages and simplified loading units:
- If there is an expiry date, it must be printed. The expiry date must be preceded by the letter "E".
- If there is no expiry date, and if the shipping date is known at the time of printing the label, the shipping date should be printed. The shipping date must be preceded by the letter "S".
- If none of the above dates are known or apply, the production date should be printed. The production date must be preceded by the letter "P".

batchNumber.description: Describes the transportation batch on a Master or Mixed labels that is attached to loading units.

numberOfInnerPackageItems.description: Describes the amount of internal packages.

OptionalInformationTrait.description: Constraint the list to an maximum of three lines.

items.description: For each line, the customer transmits one DE 7102 in the PCI segment. In order to ensure that the code is correct, the DE 7102 must not exceed 25 characters per line. If the customer transmits more char-acters per line, all characters that exceed the prescribed length are lost when the label is printed.

CustomerReference3Trait.description: Constraints the list to an maximum amount of 5 lines.

items.description: For each line, the customer transmits one DE 7102 in the PCI segment. In order to ensure that the code is correct, the DE 7102 must not exceed 25 characters per line. If the customer transmits more char-acters per line, all characters that exceed the prescribed length are lost when the label is printed.

shipFrom.description: Information about the sender of the transport unit.

shipTo.description: Information about the recipient of the transport unit.

labelType.description: Describes the Label Type according to VDA 4994

customerSpecificRouting.description: Information on customer specific routing. This information is supplied as part of the call-off and does not need to be interpreted by the supplier.

logisticsReference.description: Information of the transport unit that is relevant for the logstics.

contentDescription.description: Describes the content of the global transport label.

packageId.description: Information for identification of the transport unit.

customerReference2.description: Information integrating a comprehensive labeling protocol for the customer for inner packages and simplified loading units.

optionalInformation.description: Supplier area that includes specific information for supplier's use only. Example Value: F61F008AD4.

customerReference3.description: Additional, customer specific information for customer's use only. This field contains customer data that is transmitted in the PCI segment (qual-ifier 16 or 3) of the customer call-off.
